backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all persistent state (users, posts, reactions, comments, flags, direct messages, invite codes) and their associated types for a pseudonymous emotional support platform with access control, invite links, and crisis detection.
backend/migration.mo: Stub migration module with empty old/new actor types and a no-op run function for canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose, fixes, and design decisions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS defining OKLCH-based design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, borders, sidebar, and chart variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app at the root div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app component setting up TanStack Router with all page routes, React Query client, theme provider, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminAllUsersTab: Admin tab component listing all users with actions to suspend, unsuspend, apply cooldown, or remove each user via confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminCrisisRiskT: Admin tab displaying posts flagged for crisis risk, with actions to remove the post, send a check-in message, or send crisis resources to the author.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Main admin dashboard component with tabbed navigation covering public posts, user management, invite codes, flagged content, emotional alerts, and crisis risk. Includes an ecosystem silence banner that lets admins publish a prompt post when no public posts have been made in 5 days.
frontend/src/components/AdminEmotionalAl: Displays a list of users flagged for posting 5 or more 'Broke' entries within 3 consecutive days, showing their pseudonym and post count.
frontend/src/components/AdminFlaggedComm: Lists flagged comments with author pseudonym, timestamp, and associated post ID, allowing admins to permanently remove them via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdminFlaggedPost: Lists flagged posts with report counts and post content, allowing admins to permanently remove them via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdminInviteCodes: Manages invite codes by allowing admins to generate new codes, copy invite links to clipboard, and revoke unused codes.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublicPosts: Displays all public posts sorted by date with emotion badges, and allows admins to remove individual posts via a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to login and shows an access-denied screen for non-admin roles, rendering children only for authenticated admins.
frontend/src/components/AdminSignup.tsx: Form component that allows an admin to create a new member account by generating an invite code and registering a pseudonym and region.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserManagem: Admin panel component that lists all users with their profiles and allows updating each user's subscription status via a dropdown.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserPostHis: Admin tool that searches for a user's posts by principal ID and allows viewing and deleting individual posts.
frontend/src/components/EmotionBadge.tsx: Renders a styled pill badge for a given EmotionType (happy, confess, broke) using CSS variable-based color theming.
frontend/src/components/EntryProtectionM: Non-dismissible modal dialog shown on entry that displays a privacy/safety disclaimer and requires the user to acknowledge it before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying the copyright year and a branded link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky navigation header with links to Write, Archive, Community, and Admin pages for authenticated users, and Sign in/Join for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout wrapper that composes the Header, Footer, and a router Outlet for page content.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a single user post with its emotion badge, visibility status, date, content, and a toggle button to switch between private and public visibility.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to the login page and shows a spinner while auth state is initializing.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostCard.t: Community feed card for a public post that supports text reactions, comments, and flagging, with controls hidden for the post's own author.
frontend/src/components/PublicPostWarnin: A non-dismissible modal dialog that warns users about the visibility of public posts and requires explicit acknowledgment via an 'I understand' button.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionBann: A banner component that displays a subscription expiry notice with region-specific pricing (India or global).
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: A hook that exposes authentication state (isAuthenticated, userId, role) and a logout function by combining Internet Identity and admin-check queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, posts, comments, reactions, registration, and admin operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/component/utility layers, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes with calm OKLCH color tokens, and typography using Lora and Inter fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: A protected admin page that redirects unauthenticated or non-admin users and renders the AdminDashboard component for authorized admins.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityFeedPage.tsx: A protected page that displays a chronological list of public posts using PublicPostCard components, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page where authenticated users can create posts by selecting an emotion type, writing content, and toggling public/private visibility, with modals for entry acknowledgment and public post warnings.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity and redirects to the community page on success, with a link to the signup page.
frontend/src/pages/MyPostsPage.tsx: Page displaying all of the authenticated user's posts sorted by date, with visibility counts, empty state, and a button to create a new post.
frontend/src/pages/PostCreationPage.tsx: Dedicated post creation page with emotion selection, content input with word count enforcement, public/private toggle, and modals for entry and public post acknowledgment, redirecting to posts list after submission.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Registration page that collects a pseudonym, region, and invite code to create a new user account, showing remaining seat availability.
frontend/src/utils/cookies.ts: Utility functions for setting, getting, and clearing a client-side auth token cookie with Secure and SameSite=Strict attributes.
frontend/src/utils/subscriptionHelpers.t: Helper functions to check subscription status (active/grace), determine post creation and public posting permissions, and return regional pricing and status labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/src/utils/wordCounter.ts: Provides utilities for counting words in a string and checking if text meets a minimum word count (24 words), with a helper to determine which emotion types require the minimum.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, emotion-mode color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and plugins for animations, typography, and container queries.
project_state.json: Tracks the VEIL app's project state including architectural principles, known issues, and a list of MVP feature requests (AR-1 through AR-16+) covering registration, login, post creation, feed, reactions, flagging, and admin panel.
